summary: AN ORDINANCE related to the City of Seattle's Fleets and Facilities Department; authorizing the Mayor or his designee to grant to John Parmenter Welty and Liana Marika Welty, husband and wife, a non-exclusive easement over, through, across, and upon a portion of the property known as Fire Station 28 located at 5968 Rainier Avenue South, Seattle, Washington, and to accept the relinquishment of the existing non-exclusive easement over said property.
